medi:segment.name: Beginning of message
medi:segment.medi:documentation: BGM, A segment by which the sender uniquely identifies the Contractual conditions message by means of its type and number (for example, contract number).

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying general dates and, when relevant, times related to the whole message. The segment must be specified at least once to identify the emission date.

medi:segment.name: Additional information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ALI, A segment specifying additional information such as special conditions which are relevant to the whole contract.

medi:segment.name: Agreement identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: AGR, A segment specifying specific agreements for the contract such as contract breakdown.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment specifying the total monetary amounts for the contract (for example, maximum contract amount, minimum contract amount, or total contract amount).

medi:segment.name: Processing information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GEI, A segment specifying general processing indicators such as whether or not partial invoicing is permitted.

medi:segment.name: Payment instructions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PAI, A segment requesting or confirming conditions of payment, guarantee and method of payment for the whole contract. An example of the use of this segment is to specify that a documentary credit will be used.

medi:segment.name: Terms of delivery or transport
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TOD, A segment identifying the delivery terms to be used e.g., UN INCOTERMS code could be used to specify the delivery terms.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment with free text in coded or clear form, to give further clarification, when required, for the contract, for example the objective of the contract.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 1: A segment group to provide information such as contract revisions and, where necessary, their dates.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment identifying reference information about the contract, such as contract revisions, by their number and where appropriate, the version number.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the date/time related to the referenced information.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments specifying prices which will be applied to given ranges of purchase quantities for the whole contract.

medi:segment.name: Price details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PRI, A segment to specify the price type and amount. For example, the price which is to be applied depending on a given range of purchase quantities.

medi:segment.name: Range details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RNG, A segment specifying, if required, a range for the application of the price.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 3: A group of segments specifying quantities which are provisional or firm options to be taken up within a given date for the whole contract.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment specifying the maximum quantity as provisional of firm option for the whole contract.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate the validity period in relation to the specified quantity.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 4: A group of segments specifying information related to documents which can modify the contractual conditions with any associated dates and eventually a textual description.

medi:segment.name: Document/message details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DOC, A segment identifying the document which can modify the contractual conditions and eventually its type.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate any associated dates such as the date of issue of the document.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment identifying reference information about the document, such as the identification of a canceled service order.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment with free text in coded or clear form, to give further clarification, when required, for the document, for example the objective of the document.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 5: A group of segments specifying the currencies and related dates/periods valid for the whole contract. Currency data may be omitted in national applications but will be required for international transactions.

medi:segment.name: Currencies
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CUX, A segment identifying the currencies required in the contract e.g., the order currency. A rate of exchange may be given to convert a reference currency into a target currency.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the date, time or period related to the rate of exchange.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 6: A group of segments specifying tax related information.

medi:segment.name: Duty/tax/fee details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TAX, A segment specifying a tax type, category and rate, or exemption, relating to the whole contract e.g., Value Added Tax (VAT) at the standard rate is applicable for all items.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment specifying the amount for the identified tax or fee.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 7: A segment group specifying the terms of payment and accounting classifications applicable to the entire message.

medi:segment.name: Payment terms
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PYT, A segment identifying the payment terms and date or time basis.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment giving the specific date, time or period, if needed, of any payments, discounts, instalments etc.

medi:segment.name: Percentage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCD, A segment specifying the discount, interest, penalty as well as instalment percentage.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment specifying the amount associated with the specified accounting classification reference number data and payment information.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 8: A group of segments identifying the parties relevant to the whole contract with associated information such as bank account information, references, and free text information.

medi:segment.name: Sequence details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: SEQ, A segment identifying a sequence for the names and addresses of parties.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment identifying names and addresses of parties, in coded or clear form, and their function relevant for the contract. Identification of the supplier or suppliers and the contracting customer is mandatory for the contractual conditions message. Other parties such as the service or services which may issue orders, quality control parties, accounting office, invoicing office may also be identified.

medi:segment.name: Processing information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GEI, A segment providing general processing indicators such as processing characteristics for the parties.

medi:segment.name: Financial institution information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FII, A segment specifying bank account information in relation to the party being described.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment with free text in coded or clear form, to give further clarification, when required.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 9: A group of segments identifying references and eventually their associated dates.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment specifying reference information such as the VAT office, sub-contractors, the date or time related to the referenced information.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the date/time related to the referenced information.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 10: A segment group providing contacts and communications numbers associated with the dangerous goods information.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment identifying to whom communications should be directed.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment identifying communication numbers of the contacts to whom communications should be directed.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 11: A segment group providing information about related parties and any eventual references.

medi:segment.name: Relationship
medi:segment.medi:documentation: REL, A segment identifying the relationship a party has with another party, such as to whom a given contractor sub- contracts to.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment identifying the party in the relationship.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment identifying any references associated with the party in the relationship.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 12: A group of segments specifying allowances and charges for the whole contract.

medi:segment.name: Allowance or charge
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ALC, A segment identifying the charge or allowance and, where necessary, its calculation sequence.

medi:segment.name: Additional information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ALI, A segment indicating that the allowance or charge specified is subject to special conditions owing to origin, customs preference or commercial factors.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to identify the date, time or period information related to the allowance or charge, e.g., period of validity.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 13: A group of segments identifying the references to the allowances and charges and eventually their associated dates.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment specifying reference information such as the VAT office, sub-contractors, the date or time related to the referenced information.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the date/time related to the referenced information.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 14: A group of segments specifying the quantity of the allowance or charge with its measure unit specifier. A range to which the allowance or charge applies may be specified, e.g., an allowance of a free quantity of 20 pieces may be specified if the goods quantity contracted is greater than 1000 pieces.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment identifying the type of quantity and the quantity related to the allowance or charge.

medi:segment.name: Range details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RNG, A segment specifying, if required, the range to which the allowance or charge applies.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 15: A group of segments specifying the percentage for the allowance or charge e.g., The allowance/charge amount is calculated as 5% of the goods value or a price reduction of 5% may be specified if the goods quantity contracted is within the range 5 tons to 10 tons.

medi:segment.name: Percentage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCD, A segment identifying the percentage and the percentage basis for the calculation of the allowance or charge.

medi:segment.name: Range details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RNG, A segment specifying, if required, a range for the application of the percentage.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 16: A group of segments specifying the rate per unit and basis to which the allowance or charge applies e.g., The allowance or charge amount is 3 DEM (Deutsche Mark) per 10 tons.

medi:segment.name: Rate details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RTE, A segment specifying the rate per unit and the basis for calculation.

medi:segment.name: Range details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RNG, A segment specifying, if required, the range for the application of the allowance or charge rate.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 17: A group of segments specifying a monetary amount for an allowance or charge. A range to which the allowance or charge applies can be specified e.g., an allowance of 5000 BEF (Belgian Francs) may be specified if goods value contracted is greater than 100000 BEF (Belgian Francs).

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment identifying the monetary amount for the allowance or charge.

medi:segment.name: Range details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RNG, A segment specifying, if required, a range for the application of the allowance or charge amount.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the date or time related to the referenced information.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 18: A group of segments specifying tax related information for the allowance or charge.

medi:segment.name: Duty/tax/fee details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TAX, A segment specifying the tax type, category and rate, or exemption, related to the allowance or charge.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment specifying the tax amount for the allowance or charge.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 19: A segment group defining a formula, such as a price variation formula.

medi:segment.name: Formula
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FOR, A segment identifying a specific formula, by its number and type.

medi:segment.name: Processing information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GEI, A segment identifying general processing indicators for the formula.

medi:segment.name: Additional information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ALI, A segment specifying additional information about the formula, such as its degree of complexity.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment specifying the reference information in relation to the formula, for example the number of an identified ceiling.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the date or time related to the formula, such as dates of validity.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 20: A segment group defining each of the elements of a formula.

medi:segment.name: Formula sequence
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FSQ, A segment identifying a specific element of a formula. A sequence number provides the mathematical positioning of the element.

medi:segment.name: Rate details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RTE, A segment specifying, where necessary, static coefficients which are employed in the element of the formula.

medi:segment.name: Percentage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCD, A segment specifying, where necessary, static percentages which are employed in the element of the formula.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment specifying the unit of measure for the element of the formula.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment specifying any amounts required in the element of the formula, such as the basis for the calculation.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment identifying the complementary information in relation to the element of the formula for example the number of the ceiling formula.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the date or time related to the element of the formula.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 21: A group of segments providing the different indexes which can be used in the element of the formula. Within a formula element only one index is generally used.

medi:segment.name: Index details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IND, A segment identifying the index by its code and, where necessary, its value.

medi:segment.name: Additional information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ALI, A segment providing additional information in relation to the index.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying date, time or period details in relation to the index for example its period of validity.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment specifying quantities in relation to the index, such as the number of months to be considered.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 22: SG29-SG36-SG37-SG38-SG40 A group of segments identifying for a given contract decomposition, the parties involved and associated information.

medi:segment.name: Line item
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LIN, A segment identifying the breakdown of the contract, such as contract sections.

medi:segment.name: Additional product id
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PIA, A segment providing either additional identification to the information specified in the LIN segment (e.g., Harmonized System number), or provides any substitute identification.

medi:segment.name: Item description
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IMD, A segment for describing the information about the item being described.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment indicating any monetary amounts associated the item being described. For example the total amount contracted for the part of the contract being described.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying date, time or period details in relation to the specific section, for example the duration of the section.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment with free text in coded or clear form, to give further clarification, for example the objective of the section, when required.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 23: A group of segments identifying the references for the item being described and eventually their associated dates.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment identifying the complementary information in relation to the section for example the number of the price variation formula to be used for the section.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the date/time related to the element of the formula.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 24: A group of segments providing the tax values and their monetary amounts for a section.

medi:segment.name: Duty/tax/fee details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TAX, A segment indicating tax information in relation to the item being described, such as the VAT value to be charged for a section in the contract.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment specifying a monetary amount for the tax information.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 25: A group of segments providing general process indicators associated with the item being described segment and any information associated with the processing indicator.

medi:segment.name: Processing information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GEI, A segment indicating general processing information in relation to the item being described, such as an indication of whether or not cautions are required.

medi:segment.name: Rate details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RTE, A segment indicating rates which are associated with the processing indicator, such as indemnity rate.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment specifying a monetary amount in relation with the processing indicator, such as indemnity amount.

medi:segment.name: Duty/tax/fee details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TAX, A segment indicating tax information in relation to the processing indicator, such as the VAT value to be charged.

medi:segment.name: Percentage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCD, A segment specifying percentages such as the percentage work in progress necessary before recovering advance instalments.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the date, time or period related to the processing indicator, such as the period duration.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 26: A group of segments identifying quantities for the level in question.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment identifying quantity information for the level in question.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment providing date or time information for the quantities.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 27: A group of segments identifying the formulas to be used in the section of the contract. For example those used for the calculation of penalties or bonuses.

medi:segment.name: Formula
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FOR, A segment group defining a formula, such as a price variation formula.

medi:segment.name: Additional information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ALI, A segment specifying additional information about the formula, such as its degree of complexity.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment specifying any monetary amounts associated with the formula. For example minimum and maximum ceiling amounts.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment specifying the reference information in relation to the formula, for example the number of an identified ceiling formula.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the date or time related to the formula, such as dates of validity.

medi:segment.name: Processing information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GEI, A segment specifying general processing information associated with the formula.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 28: A segment group defining each of the elements of a formula.

medi:segment.name: Formula sequence
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FSQ, A segment identifying a specific element of a formula. A sequence number provides the mathematical positioning of the element.

medi:segment.name: Rate details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RTE, A segment specifying, where necessary, static coefficients which are employed in the element of the formula.

medi:segment.name: Percentage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCD, A segment specifying, where necessary, static percentages which are employed in the element of the formula.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment specifying the unit of measure for the element of the formula.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment specifying any amounts required in the element of the formula, such as the basis for the calculation.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment identifying the complementary information in relation to the element of the formula for example the number of the ceiling formula.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the date/time related to the element of the formula.

medi:segment.name: Processing information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GEI, A segment specifying general processing information in relation with the formula sequence such as indications about the calculation basis.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment specifying quantities in relation with the formula sequence.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 29: A group of segments specifying allowances and charges for the whole contract.

medi:segment.name: Allowance or charge
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ALC, A segment identifying the charge or allowance and, where necessary, its calculation sequence.

medi:segment.name: Additional information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ALI, A segment indicating that the allowance or charge specified is subject to special conditions owing to origin, customs preference or commercial factors.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to identify the date, time or period information related to the allowance or charge, e.g., period of validity.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 30: A group of segments identifying the references to the allowances and charges and eventually their associated dates.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment specifying reference information such as the VAT office, sub-contractors, the date or time related to the referenced information.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the date or time related to the referenced information.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 31: A group of segments specifying the quantity of the allowance or charge with its measure unit specifier. A range to which the allowance or charge applies may be specified, e.g., an allowance of a free quantity of 20 pieces may be specified if the goods quantity contracted is greater than 1000 pieces.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment identifying the type of quantity and the quantity related to the allowance or charge.

medi:segment.name: Range details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RNG, A segment specifying, if required, the range to which the allowance or charge applies.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 32: A group of segments specifying the percentage for the allowance or charge e.g., The allowance/charge amount is calculated as 5% of the goods value or a price reduction of 5% may be specified if the goods quantity contracted is within the range 5 tons to 10 tons.

medi:segment.name: Percentage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCD, A segment identifying the percentage and the percentage basis for the calculation of the allowance or charge.

medi:segment.name: Range details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RNG, A segment specifying, if required, a range for the application of the percentage.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 33: A group of segments specifying the rate per unit and basis to which the allowance or charge applies e.g., The allowance or charge amount is 3 DEM (Deutsche Mark) per 10 tons.

medi:segment.name: Rate details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RTE, A segment specifying the rate per unit and the basis for calculation.

medi:segment.name: Range details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RNG, A segment specifying, if required, the range for the application of the allowance or charge rate.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 34: A group of segments specifying a monetary amount for an allowance or charge. A range to which the allowance or charge applies can be specified e.g., an allowance of 5000 BEF (Belgian Francs) may be specified if goods value contracted is greater than 100000 BEF (Belgian Francs).

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment identifying the monetary amount for the allowance or charge.

medi:segment.name: Range details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RNG, A segment specifying, if required, a range for the application of the allowance or charge amount.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the date or time related to the referenced information.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 35: A group of segments specifying tax related information for the allowance or charge.

medi:segment.name: Duty/tax/fee details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TAX, A segment specifying the tax type, category and rate, or exemption, related to the allowance or charge.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment specifying the tax amount for the allowance or charge.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 36: A group of segments identifying the relevant pricing information for the information identified.

medi:segment.name: Price details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PRI, A segment to specify the price type and amount.

medi:segment.name: Additional price information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: APR, A segment to identify pricing information such as a price multiplier, the class or type of trade and additionally identifying the reason for any changes.

medi:segment.name: Range details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RNG, A segment to identify the ranges (quantity, amount, etc) to which the additional price information applies.

medi:segment.name: Currencies
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CUX, A segment to allow to specify the currency of the price.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to identify the date/time/period information related to the price change e.g., period of validity.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 37: A group of segments indicating the terms of delivery.

medi:segment.name: Terms of delivery or transport
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TOD, A segment identifying the delivery terms to be used.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment identifying locations relevant to the delivery terms.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 38: A group of segments identifying the packaging, physical dimensions and marks and numbers for goods referenced.

medi:segment.name: Package
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PAC, A segment specifying the number and type of packages e.g., number and type of pallets.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment specifying physical measurements of packages being described e.g., package length, weight.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 39: A group of segments specifying the markings and labels on individual physical units.

medi:segment.name: Package identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCI, A segment specifying markings and labels used on individual physical units (packages).

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment identifying the master label number.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the dates relevant to the package markings.

medi:segment.name: Goods identity number
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GIN, A segment identifying the number or ranges of numbers for use with the package markings.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 40: A group of segments providing information about the parties involved in the level of information being described. For example parties responsible for the part of the contract being described.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment identifying the party involved in the item being described.

medi:segment.name: Processing information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GEI, A segment providing general processing information associated with the party. For example, their type of creditor.

medi:segment.name: Financial institution information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FII, A segment providing the financial institution identification for the party, e.g., its bank account.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment providing monetary amount in relation with the party. For example the instalment amount.

medi:segment.name: Duty/tax/fee details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TAX, A segment indicating tax information in relation to the party.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment providing reference information in relation to the party. For example the catalog number.
